title: Hardest Non-final/bonus boss in a video game you've played
body:
As to in to say, the hardest boss in a game you played that was neither the final boss or part of an optional sidequest/purposefully super hard bonus boss

To me that would be this jerk
http://img1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20131004032541/finalfantasy/images/0/06/Yunalesca_2-enemy-ffx.png
WHY DOES SHE NEED FOUR FORMS WHEN NO OTHER BOSS HAS MORE THAN ONE FORM?!
AND WHYYYYYY DOES SHE HAVE TO SPAM ZOMBIE? THERE IS LITERALLY ONE OTHER GUY IN THE GAME THAT USES ZOMBIE AND WE'RE ALREADY PAST HIM.
AND THE ONLY SHOP THAT SELLS HOLY WATER IS LIKE FOUR HOURS BACK THAT WAY
